note:
I am the creator of the Sensory Spirit Podcast and community which aims to make Spirituality Accessible, Practical and delightful. I am a certified Shamanic
Practitioner, , Essential Oil Specialist, Advanced Crystal Practitioner, Hypnotherapist, and life coach who absolutely loves working with the Norse Runes.
I am an avid technology enthusiast, performer, Swish player, and foodie. I also love all things live audio described including performance, art galeries,
and museum's.
